attributes.action: Don't bully our breed stand together for our XL Bullys
attributes.additional_details: Not all XL bully are aggressive it's the way you trained them most of them are loveable family pets all they want is to be loved and constantly fussed with cuddles and hugs etc just because some have accatck and killed don't all the XL bully ls dangerous that's the thing yous don't get
attributes.background: So the government and parliament won't to band the XL bully well let's tell them straight it's not the dogs it's the owners ho have no experience with the breed at all any dog can bite any dog kill

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
